entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Richardson mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Snow near the Richardson mountains in the evening. Amount 2 cm near the Richardson mountains. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023
